short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust playback speed of videos on the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control video playback speed on any website with this simple Chrome extension. Adjust speeds directly from your browser to customize your viewing experience on platforms like YouTube and more. Perfect for quick content browsing or slowing down details.
